[color=#a4885c]Ketchup[/color]

- 5u ketchup - 5u mayo

- 5u ketchup - 5u vinegar - 5u sugar

- 5u tomato juice - 5u salt - 5u capsaicin oil
[color=#a4885c]Vinegar[/color]
- 5u ethanol - 5u oxygen
[color=#a4885c]Soy Sauce[/color]
- 10u soy milk - 5u sulfuric acid
[color=#a4885c]Vinaigrette[/color]
- 5u vinegar - 5u olive oil - 5u black pepper
[color=#a4885c]Tomato Sauce[/color]
- 5u olive oil - 5u salt - Tomato
[color=#a4885c]Pesto[/color]
- 5u olive oil - 5u salt - Garlic
[color=#a4885c]Bechamel[/color]
- 5u milk - 5u flour - 5u butter
